Vart han än gick innanför Trollmarks murar kände han olust, och utanför murarna kunde man alltid förnimma stanken av död och förruttnelse.

På stigen som ledde in mot borgen såg han en man - eller var det en pojke - gå mot porten. Från sin postering högt ovanför tyckte han att mannen såg ovanligt blek ut, dessutom hade han på tok for lite kläder på sig. Mannen bar ett stort svärd över ryggen. Det var helt uppenbart att han var hirdman, men likväl tycktes det som om han inte blommat ut och blivit man ännu.

"Avslöja ditt namn och ditt ärende", skrek Samund från murkrönet.

Mannen stannade upp och tittade mot Samund.

"Jag har kommit för att tjäna, vad du kallar mig spelar ingen roll."

Föga anade Samund att mannen bar på undergången och inget gott skulle komma av hans besök till Trollmark.

Likstorm heter den sista och avslutande delen i sviten om Den svarta solen. Det fungerar visserligen som ett fristående äventyr men för dem som spelat Vildhjarta, Snösaga och Eldsjäl sätter Likstorm punkt för en episk kampanj som utspelat sig under flera år och över hela Osthem.

Likstorm lämpar sig bäst for erfarna spelare och inte minst spelledaren bör ha spellett några äventyr innan han/hon ger sig på Likstorm.

I boken finns en mängd information om staden och borgen Trollmark i norra Osthem, liksom utförlig kampanjinformation om olika platser och spelledarpersoner.

82964.name: Jetpac Refuelled
82964.description:
Jetpac Refuelled is a video game developed by Rare for the Xbox 360's Xbox Live Arcade service.
Gameplay

Jetpac Refuelled is an updated take on the original Jetpac with overhauled high-definition graphics and a total of 128 levels. It also features gameplay over Xbox Live, Leaderboards, and Achievements.
A version of the original Jetpac is also included in the game.

Jetpac Refuelled features a multiplayer mode that can be played with a friend on a single Xbox 360 or online via Xbox Live.
Two players compete on one screen to build, fuel, and launch their rocket first. Items can be stolen from your opponent by shooting it out of their hand or by using an EMP at close range. Lives are unlimited in multiplayer and the winner is decided by score. The match ends when the set time limit expires.
Leaderboards are offered for single player Refuelled, single player Retro, and each duration of multiplayer. The leaderboards can be filtered by top score, your score, or filtered to display your friends scores only.

Source: Wikipedia, "Jetpac Refuelled," available under the CC-BY-SA License.

82965.name: Dirty Harry: The War Against Drugs
82965.description:
Dirty Harry: The War Against Drugs, also referred to as simply Dirty Harry on the game's cover and in the in-game menus, is a 1990 video game based on the Dirty Harry film franchise starring Clint Eastwood.

Gameplay

The game is a side-scroller, in which players must guide Dirty Harry throughout San Francisco. He wears a blue suit, although it can be exchanged for a white suit. He wields his signature .44 magnum, and players have to ability to draw the weapon without actually firing it. This allows the player to walk around while aiming at punks and dare them to feel lucky. Most notable, in reference to real-life handguns, the .44 also exhibits a recoil effect when fired.

Other weapons consist of LAWs rockets, harpoon guns, and explosive remote-controlled cars. When injured, Harry's health can be restored by eating chili dogs.

Film references

Although it is non-canon to the film series and novels, it however incorporates several references to the film series. The game uses digitized speech to deliver both of Harry's famous lines ("Make my day", "I know what you're thinking..."), and the showdown occurs on Alcatraz island. This feature pre-dates Duke Nukem 3D's many digitized phrases by six years.

Source: Wikipedia, "Dirty Harry: The War Against Drugs", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

82966.name: Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures
82966.description:
Clone Wars Adventures is an action-packed online game set in the world of the hit television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars. The game is scheduled for release this fall. If you are a fan of the adventures of Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Ahsoka Tano and the Clone Troopers, you won't want to miss what we have in store for you online!

Clone Wars Adventures lets you become the hero by taking part in the battle against the Separatist droid army. There's so much you can do as you train to become the best in the galaxy...

Source: The Game Website.

82967.name: House of Usher
82967.description:
User Review:

House of Usher is an extremely difficult platformer that requires a character looking a little bit like a hunchback to solve riddles in ten rooms to access room X and find the treasure. The riddles have mostly to do with traversing rooms filled with platforms that are breaking away, that are invisible or moving etc.. Sometimes monsters or other obstacles like canon balls have to be avoided. Maneuvering the character is very difficult and the jumps have to be timed very precisely. Definitely not for the faint of heart.

82968.name: Club Penguin: Game Day!
82968.description:
It's game day! Are you ready for the challenge?

Paly in the first ever Club Penguin island-wide Game Day challenge only on Wii console. Create your own penguin, join a team and compete against other penguin teams in Java Jump, Sled & Slide, Sumo Smash, Fast Freeze and more.Compete to see who is the bestteam once and for all!

- compete in 12 events and 12 challenges
- choose your team - single or multiplayer up to 4 players
- conquer the island
- connect to clubpenguin.com
- take your penguin to your friend's house on your Wii remote
- advantage system for level playing field

Source: The Publisher Website.

82969.name: Dance Dance Revolution: Hottest Party 3
82969.description:
DanceDanceRevolution: Taking the revolution to another level! DanceDanceRevolution is sure to be the life of the party and get you into shape with outrageous multiplayer fun, huge smash hit soundtrack, entirely new modes and more!


Work out to the beat using your DanceDanceRevolution Wii Controller or now introducing compatibility with the Wii balance board.
Exclusive gimmicks such as the Hip Roll and Bump Arrows appear in-game.
Punch while moving your hips, enjoy working out and help get your body in shape.
Exciting new costume customization of your DanceDanceRevolution Hottest Party 3 dancer including your Mii.
Inclusion of 50 tracks on disk for both skus, featuring major licensed master, original and Latin tracks including :


o "Disturbia" / Rihanna
o "Closer" / Ne-Yo
o "One Step At A Time" / Jordin Sparks
o "Pocketful of Sunshine" / Natasha Bedingfield
o "Viva La Vida" / Coldplay
o "My Prerogative" / Bobby Brown
o "Boogie Wonderland" / Earth Wind & Fire
o "Space Dance" / Danny Tenaglia
o "I'm Coming Out" / Diana Ross
o "Feel Good Inc." / Gorillaz

Extensive new modes in DanceDanceRevolution Hottest Party 3, including a fresh new Work Out Mode, fun new Story Mode, Kids Modes with much simpler controls and a Lesson Mode to practice timing and directions of arrows so that new dancers can learn the basics.
A completely new Lesson Mode "DDR School", you can learn how to play DDR with ease on your Wii.




Source: The Publisher Website.

82970.name: Jane's USAF
videogamehonor: 1999 Game Critics Best Simulation Game of the Year Winner (Flight)
82970.description:
Jane's USAF is a military jet aircraft era Combat flight simulation video game set around the time of the Persian Gulf War. The combat flight simulation is a survey simulation but featuring good photorealistic graphics and decent flight models. The simulation features 8 stock player flyable aircraft such as the F-105 Thunderchief, F-4E Phantom II, F-16C Fighting Falcon, F-15C Eagle, F-15E Strike Eagle, A-10A Thunderbolt II, F-117A Nighthawk, and the F-22A Raptor as the stock planes in the basic simulation.

In the game you can play from four campaigns: Vietnam, Desert Storm, and the two "future" Red Arrow and Sleeping Giant fictional wars. There is a variety of missions in Iraq, Vietnam, and Germany. The gameplay is realistic including multi-fight missions, and realistic enemy AI.

Also included are single missions, with maps from the Middle East to Korea. Training missions include take-off, landing, and refueling in Nellis Air Force Base

Source: Wikipedia, "Jane's USAF", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

82971.name: Dance Dance Revolution Music Fit
82971.description:
Dance Dance Revolution Music Fit is a music video game by Konami for the Japanese Nintendo Wii.

Includes the songs:
Carmen Zensoukyoku
William Tell Jokyoku Yori
A Perfect Sky
Ayumi"
Bluebird
Butterfly
Cat's Eye
Climax Jump Pop'n Form
Hot Limit is a song by High and Mighty Color.
Journey Through the Decade" is a song by Gackt.
Kun wo Mamotte Kun wo Itoshite
Meikyuu Butterfly
My Boy
Now's the Time
Odoru Ponpokorin
Samurai Sentai Shinkenja
Shangri-La
Shizuku
Sorairo Days
Sou Hijiri no Aquarion
Stairway Generation
Summer Rain
Sunao Ninaretara
Yamainu Temusoe
Yume wo Kanae te Doraemon

Source: Wikipedia, "Dance Dance Revolution Music Fit", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

82972.name: Alphabounce
82972.description:
The ESCorp is a mega-powerful corporation which uses its prisoners, the players, to extract minerals in outer space. This browser game mixes classic breakout-style with some RPG-type features. The number of levels in this game is literally infinite!

Source: The Publisher Website.

82973.name: Jane's Air Superiority Collection
82973.description:
Compilation box, containing Electronic Arts's:

JCS: US Air Force (1999),
JCS: Israeli Air Force (1998) and
JCS: F-15 (1998)

82974.name: Wall-E
82974.description:
User Summary

"One small robot, One giant adventure" - As this is the tag line for both the movie and the game, there's no surprise that the plot of this cute Disney game parallels the silver screen version.

The game begins on a garbage-strewn Earth where WALL-E, a boxy little robot, toils endlessly at the mess until being launched into an interstellar mission to find the planet's former inhabitants and restore life on Earth. During some scenes (and co-op modes), the player can also control a flying robot named EVA who assists WALL-E.

82975.name: Dance Dance Revolution X2
82975.description:
Dance Dance Revolution X2, abbreviated DDR X2 or simply X2, is a music video game, and a part of the Dance Dance Revolution series.
Over 70 new songs are included in X2. All licensed songs from Dance Dance Revolution SuperNova and Dance Dance Revolution SuperNova 2 (With the exception of "Angelus" and "Golden Sky") have been removed due to their licenses expiring. However, 4 classic licensed songs from earlier DDR mixes have returned in remastered form, along with a special remixed license track.

One of the new features included in the main game mode is a special "extra stage" system. Known as Replicant D-action, this mode allows players to choose from a set of 6 difficult songs. When a player gets rank AA or more one of these songs (any difficulty), they receive a medal for that particular track. When players subsequently earn all 6 medals, they can access the Encore Extra Stage, "Valkyrie dimension".

Source: Wikipedia, "Dance Dance Revolution X2", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

82976.description:
Crystal blue seas, tropical heat and crazy nightclubs are Key West, the extreme tip of the Florida Keys and a paradise for people who enjoy a wild and thrilling existence, including people like the writer Ernest Hemingway who was attracted by more than just the sea and the bars.

How will you make your way there? You might make good money with hotels, but first bridges must be built so that tourists, artists and business people of all kinds can flock to the islands. Plantations and cigar factories can show lush profits as well. Adventurers are attracted out to sea, where they dive for sunken shipwrecks and treasures. But the bottom line in Key West is that wanting everything is never a good goal. Don't get bogged down; stay cool and plan your actions like a pro.

Key West is set in the 1930s and depicts the economic development of the Florida Keys. Players build hotels, maintain fruit plantations, buy cigar factories (both producing and selling), ensure that bridges are built, and search the deeps for treasure and wrecks. It features an original and surprising auction mechanism from Martin Schlegel.

The game is divided into two parts: first bidding, then actions. At the beginning of each of the eight rounds, there is a offers phase, in which players bid to secure Key West cards, which represent, for example, ownership of bridges and plantations and other benefits for the subsequent actions round. Individual actions are a finite and players will need to approach them tactically. It often won't be possible to do everything one wants and what not to do an agonizing decision.

Both experienced players and families will find something to like in Key West. There are seven different paths for generating victory points, but those who try to get involved everywhere won't succeed. The focus should be on three or four programs. In the next game one can try a different set. As there are thus many combinations, the intentions is that matters stay fresh for many re-playings.

An Essen 2010 game. See you at spiele-idee.de Hall 4 Booth 414

Source: based on publisher blurb
82976.name: Key West
boardgameexpansion: Siberia / Key West / Bangkok Klongs Expansion

82977.name: Dance on Broadway
82977.description:
Dance on Broadway is the Wii dance game that puts YOU center stage performing some of the biggest Broadway hits right at home! Dance, sing, and act to hit songs from your favorite musical performances, like ‘You Can’t Stop the Beat’, ‘Fame’, and ‘Luck Be A Lady’- just to name a few! Challenge up to four friends for the starring role. Get your jazz hands ready for Dance on Broadway!

Key features:

Broadway’s Biggest Hits :

- Perform 20 authentic Broadway-style choreographies from the most beloved showtunes, including ‘Cabaret’, ‘My Favorite Things’, ‘Dreamgirls’, ‘Roxie’, and many more!

Fun for Everyone :
- Challenge up to four friends for the high score spotlight.
- Includes musicals that appeal to all ages, whether you ‘Let the Sunshine In’ or croon ‘Lullaby of Broadway’.
- Easy to pick up and play, all you need is the Wii Remote!

Get your Act Together :
- Challenge yourself to dance your very best AND sing along to the on-screen lyrics for a full performance.
- A workout in disguise, ‘Dance on Broadway’ will get you moving to the beat as you burn calories while having fun!

Source: The Developer Website.

82978.name: Gundead Defense
82978.description:
Gundead Defense - Wild West Zombie Tower Defense

The only multiplayer Tower Defense Game for the iPhone and iPod touch.

1885. A zombie outbreak is ravaging the Western Frontier. Death is everywhere, but there's plenty of money to steal if you can get to it alive.

Take charge of a gang of outlaws looking to pull a legendary heist in the middle of zombie country.

A new type of Tower Defense gameplay
Not only defend your stronghold, but for the first time ever order your henchmen to attack the zombie base!
Plan your attack!
- Order henchmen into battle, ranging from speedy scouts to slow burly brawlers.
- Time the waves of your attacks to exploit weaknesses in the zombie defenses.
- Strategically spend funds to boost your men's Speed, Health, and Resistance for the perfect assault.

Defend your stronghold!
- Command a posse armed with Six Shooters, Shotguns, Molotov Cocktails, and Gatling Guns to make a stand against those brain-thirsty zombies!
- Upgrade your weapons to inflict even more damage with devastating special attacks.

Multiplayer
- Two modes to square off against you friends:
- Head to Head: Play against your friends wirelessly
- Hotseat: Pass and play on a single iPhone or iPod touch
Classic features
- Quickplay Mode throws you right in the middle of the action!
- Campaign Mode takes you along on a bank heist to hell and back!
- Multiplayer immediately available.
- 7 different maps.
- An edgy art style that soaks the Classic Western in the gore of Zombie Horror.
- Original soundtrack written & performed by the band Tomcat Combat.

Zombie in-game expansion
- Play as the Zombies! New powers! New strategies!
- 7 additional maps!
- Lead a zombie hoard of Biters, Screamers, Hurlers, and Swarmers to MORE BRAINS!
- Campaign Mode features a storyline from the Zombie perspective!
- Zombie faction unlocked in Multiplayer

Source: The Developer Website.

82979.name: Silent Line: Armored Core
82979.description:
User Summary

'Silent Line' is the first sequel to 'Armored Core 3'. After the destruction of the machine-run society at the end of 'Armored Core 3', humanity begins the process of resettling the Earth's surface. However, one region remains unreachable; the border of this region is known as the Silent Line.

82980.name: Best Friends Tonight
82980.description:
Newly recruited as the star of Teen Planet’s TV show, you must make the cast become best friends - otherwise the TV show will be cancelled!

Key Features:

Be charismatic as the anchor of the Teen Planet TV Show

Guide the cast to success as you build a friendly atmosphere on the TV set to keep the Teen Planet’s TV show on air.

Be the best friend one can ever have: be attentive, care for your friends, advise them and support them when needed

Have fun through many different activities to build stronger friendships

Engage cast members in a variety of activities to improve their skills for the show.

Source: The Publisher Website.

82981.name: Call of Juarez
82981.description:
Call of Juarez is a Western-themed first-person shooter from the Polish developer Techland. First released for Windows in 2006, it was ported to the Xbox 360 on June 5, 2007. The North American release of the PC version is one of the first games to utilize Microsoft's DirectX 10. It was released on June 12, 2007. Its prequel Call of Juarez: Bound in Blood was released in 2009.

A narrator tells the legend of the Gold of Juarez, which was allegedly meant as a ransom for Moctezuma, held hostage by conquistadores. The treasure was lost long ago and never found again. Nevertheless, many daring souls set out to retrieve the riches of the Aztec Empire, but the treasure is rumored to be cursed.

Source: Wikipedia, "Call of Juarez", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

User Summary
Players assume the role of opposing primary characters, alternating control between Billy Candle, a young half-native man accused of murdering his family, and his Uncle Ray, a firebrand preacher bent on exacting justice. Their chase across Texas plays out as hunter and prey until they find a common foe.

82982.name: Imagine: Sweet 16
82982.description:
You’re about to turn 16 and you’ve just joined a new high school. How will you become THE girl to know? By planning, promoting and hosting the most awesome Sweet Sixteen parties - including your own!

Features

Social Networking on your DS: Build your virtual friend network and boost your popularity by hosting parties for you classmates!

Get Creative: Select your party’s theme and decorations, plan fun activities for your guests, and pick the right music to keep the party going all night long!

Have Fun: Pay attention to your guests’ moods and make sure everyone has a rockin’ good time to boost your score.

Source: The Developer Website.

82983.name: Selection
82983.description:
As admitted on the box cover, Selection is a Yathzee-inspired card game which uses an 80-card 5°Dimension Playing Card deck. Over 11 rounds, players build of seven cards. Draw-poker style, players can exchange cards twice or thrice, depending on the current turn. From their final hand of seven cards, they must select five to use in scoring.

Scoring is done by matching five cards in a player's hand to one (and only one) scoring combination. There are eleven combinations, following familiar poker hands (such as full house, straight, flush, etc). Each scoring combination can be selected once by each player.

The game ends after 11 rounds, with the player accumulating the highest score winning.

82984.name: Praetorians
videogamehonor: 2004 D.I.C.E. Strategy Game of the Year Nominee (Computer)
82984.description:
From the back of the box:

"For the glory of the Empire!

Praetorians is an epic real time strategy game set at the rise of the Roman Empire and Julius Ceasar's drive to extend its borders. As a Roman general, you will travel through 24 missions across the desert battlefields of Egypt, the frozen lands of the Barbarian tribes and to the heart of the Empire itself - Italy.

Control three different civilizations, each featuring a unique set of troops and war machines.

The terrain and landscape play a major part in battle. Your enemy will understand each situation's defensive and offensive possibilities - will YOU?

Compete for the honour of Rome with up to 8 generals over LAN or Internet.

From Pyro Studios - the creators of the Commandos series."

82985.name: Armored Core: Nexus
82985.description:
Armored Core: Nexus is a mecha video game in the Armored Core series. It is the sequel to Silent Line: Armored Core.

Years have passed since the incident at the Silent Line, and with it the collaborative effort began by the Corporations in response to it is long gone. The battle between the Corporations has re-emerged and continues unabated. Now a new Corporation has entered the scene; this Corporation, Navis, while nowhere near the size of the other Corporations, does have a trump card; it has complete control over a brand new and very useful resource, and they don't intend to share. The other Corporations obviously won't sit back and let that stand, so they set up contracts with Ravens through Raven's Ark. Of course, Navis is employing the use of the Ravens as well, and a full-scale conflict seems apparent on the horizon. Once again, you are thrust into the lines of corporate warfare, but does something even more dangerous lie in wait?

Source: Wikipedia, "Armored Core: Nexus", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

82986.name: RuckBowl
82986.description:
Edited, March 26th 2015.
RuckBowl is a two-player Rugby Union board game, where players control two teams of rugby-men. Each team has only 10 pawns (instead of 15). There are 4 forwards in RuckBowl, and each forward represents 2 real forwards. The n°10 in RuckBowl represents the real fly-half and the real scrum-half. So the 10 pawns in RuckBowl represent 15 real players. Why 10 pawns? Because it is easier to manipulate 10 pawns than 15 pawns. The game becomes quicker and more nervous with 10 pawns.
RuckBowl uses a square-grid board: 15 columns by 28 lines : almost the BloodBowl pitch...

The game is played taking turns: each turn is divided in two segments: Segment I for placing players and launching play, and Segment II for the current play.

What happens in the Segment I :
Kick-off, Re-start Kick, 22 m drop out, Scrum, Lineout, Penalty kick.

There is several options in the Segment II:
Option 1. The coach moves his players, passes the ball, kicks the ball, attempt crash charges or tackles, or attempt a drop-goal,
Option 2 or 3. The coach declares a Ruck or a Maul.
Option 4. The coach declares a Mark.

Some actions need dice rolls: tackle, crash charge, kick, Ruck, Maul, Scrum, etc. A bad die roll can lead to a Scrum, a penalty, or a turn-over, etc. The opposition can react by: intercepting the ball, tackling the ball carrier, catching a kicked ball, etc... Each team can score with Try, Drop Goal, and Penalty Kick. And don’t forget: passing the ball to a team mate in front of you is totally forbidden !

RuckBowl is a game where you must make the good decision all the time : what can I make ? pass the ball, kick, kicking in touch, move the ball carrier, declare a ruck ?

In order to customize your team, you can use Team cards.

Each player has his own profile :
Move (for...movements).
Power (for melees : scrum, ruck, maul).
Catch (for catching the free ball, after a kick or a bounce).
Impact (for tackles).
Pass (for passes).
Kick (when the ball is kicked).

RuckBowl is a complex game, for 14 year old (or more).

82987.name: Trudvangs äventyrare
82987.description:
From the back of the book (in Swedish):

Ingur var dotter till Hergir på tunet och Lovak Sköldtvingare och det var aldrig tal om att hon skulle sättas i arbete på gården eller utföra sysslor som inte hade med huggjärn och härskjortor att göra. Sådant skulle trälarna göra menade Hergir och Lovak. Inte minst Lovaks far Stormgeir Gutranäve var fast och övertygad om den saken, och därför tvekade han aldrig att bekosta Ingurs träning när Lovak kom till honom och bad om hjälp.

Efter ett kort blot vid gården, överräckning av gåvor och några uppmuntrande ord från såväl stormikjalten som Stormgeir, Hergir och Lovak skickades hon i skola långt väster ut över havet. Det kom sig nämligen att Stormgeir hade en vän som från sina resor och räder i västerled skapat god kontakt med bulturerna i Sylvan och alla visste ju att de var goda mästare på att lära ut de digra vapenkonsterna. Det var alltså denna vän som efter en gåva eller två hade sett till så att Ingur nu skulle få bo, äta, sova och leva med svärdet vid sin sida under hela sin uppväxt. Och så blev det.

Trudvangs äventyrare heter denna bok som är fullmatad med information och tips. Här hittar du bland annat:


Beskrivning om olika personligheter och hur de kan spelas.
Ingående redogörelse av de spelbara raserna inkluderat utökad information kring halvtroll och halvalfer och vildmän - ett nytt spelbart människofolk.
Yrken och uppväxtmiljöer samt tips hur man spelar olika arketyper för olika raser.
Mängder av nya fördjupningar till samtliga arketyper och inte minst en ny nivå fördjupningar för de som uppnått hjältestatus.


Kort sagt en bok som innehåler mer av allt för den som vill sätta färg på sin rollperson och som redan spelar Drakar och Demoner Trudvang.

User translation:

Ingur was the daughter of Hergir of the homestead and Lovak Sköldtvingare, no suggestions were ever made that she should work on the farm and perform chores unless they were related to swords and armour. That is for the thralls to do, said Hergir and Lovak. Lovak's father Stormgeir Gutranäve was firmly convinced of this and therefore he never hesitated to pay for Ingur's training when Lova came to him and asked for help.

After a short sacrificial ritual at the farm, she was given gifts and a few encouraging words from both the stormikjalt [a priest] on one hand and Stormgeir, Hergir and Lova on the other. She was then sent to a school far west over the sea.

It came to pass that Stormgeir had a friend from his travels and raids westwards that had made good contact with the Bultur in Sylvan, everyone knew they were great masters at teaching various weapon techniques. It was this friend who after a gift or two had seen to it that Ingur would now have the opportunity to stay, eat, sleep and live with the sword at her side throughout her childhood. And so it became.

Trudvangs äventyrare is packed with information and tips. Here you will find:


Descriptions of different personalities and how they can be played.
Detailed descriptions of the playable races including extended information about the halftrolls, halfelves, and wild man - a new playable human race.
Professions and backgrounds and advice on how to play different archetypes of different races.
Lots of new specializations for all archetypes and new levels of specialization for those who attained hero status.


In short, a book that contains more of everything for those who want to flesh out their character and who are already playing Drakar och Demoner Trudvang.

82988.name: Grey's Anatomy: The Video Game
82988.description:
Immerse yourself for the first time in the world of Grey's Anatomy as Seattle Grace Hospital is struck by one of the worst crises in the hospital’s history. Experience a whole new story written in collaboration with the Grey’s Anatomy TV show production team and writers.

Key features

-Live the most intense moments of a Grey's Anatomy crisis through all of your favorite characters' eyes, hands, minds, and hearts.

-For the first time ever, play as Meredith, Derek, Cristina, or any of your favorite cast members, with 3D character models based on the original TV actors' likenesses. See the state of the cast as it deals with one of the worst crises in the hospital's history.

-Influence character dialogue and make critical decisions that affect the outcome of the storyline and the state of the hospital.

-Take hold of your Wii Remote, Nintendo DS stylus or PC-compatible mouse to perform multi-step surgeries as you tackle life-or-death situations in the operating room.

-User-friendly interface and innovative gameplay takes advantage of the freedom of the Wii Remote, Nintendo DS stylus and PC-compatible mouse.

Source: The Developer Website.

82989.name: Hornet: Naval Strike Fighter
82989.description:
From the back of the box

Assume the role of a U.S. Navy or Marine Corps F/A-18 fighter pilot and fly joint operations for the West with your Air Force F-16 brethren. Hornet: Naval Strike Fighter is the only fighter simulation that lets you create cooperative missions with F-16 Falcons in seven Falcon 3.0 theaters of war: Panama, Israel, Kuwait, Korea, Japan, India and Bosnia. It's you and your squadron against the Soviet MiG-29 squadron and its complement of supporting aircraft and ground forces. Whatever you and your wingmen decide, this fight will be the ultimate test of your dexterity, agility and teamwork.

The completely authentic F/A-18 cockpit design features a large Head-Up Display and three multi-function displays including easy-to-read engine monitors, Hughes AN/APG-65 multimode radar, Maverick missile targeting display, and combined Horizontal Situation Indicator/Color Map. Test yourself with challenging carrier landings, complete with standard naval 3/4-mile approach, "meatball" electro-optical landing guidance system, and hook-and-wire arrests with four wires (can you catch the #3 wire for a perfect landing?). Once you take off, there's no turning back. Your wingmen are counting on you.


F/A-18's fast acceleration and tight turns allow "turn and burn" team tactics against enemy MiGs
Challenging carrier landings with digitized radio calls from the LSO for lineup and graded landing
Team play on a network with teams of Marine Corps F/A-18s and Air Force F-16 aircraft vs. the deadly MiG-29s
New theater of war: Bosnia
Compatible with Operation: Fighting Tiger and MiG-29: Deadly Adversary of Falcon 3.0

82990.name: TNA Wrestling
82990.description:
Get ready to experience Total Nonstop Action anytime, anywhere!

In the new TNA Wrestling iPhone game you'll get to control your career as you work your way up from unsigned rookie to TNA World Champion. Master wrestling strategy and the turn based battle system to control the action both in and out of the ring. Forge alliances, make enemies and even try your luck at charming the TNA Knockouts.

Climb into the six sided ring and go head to head with your favorite TNA stars including Kurt Angle, Samoa Joe, Sting, AJ Styles, The Latin American Xchange and more.

Features
-Create and customize your wrestler's look and persona
-Compete in one on one, tag team and gauntlet matches.
-Accumulate experience points in the ring and on the microphone to unlock new moves, finishers and customization options.
-Play through an extensive career campaign or wrestle in tournament mode

Source: The Developer Website.

82991.name: Football U
82991.description:
Welcome to Football U, the most immersive and irreverent 3D football game, designed exclusively for the iPhone and iPod touch.

YOU are the star QB. Run your offense, pick your plays, target your receivers, and make the perfect pass. Nail completions and score touchdowns.

Each week of the season, a new and more screwed-up teammate gets in your way. Superstition, lady problems, blackmail... the only way to turn this maddening bunch of misfits into champs is to solve their problems for them.

Great football gameplay in the tradition of our favorite sports comedies.

Source: The Developer Website.

82992.name: Trudvang Spelledarskärm
82992.description:
User summary

The Trudvang Spelledarskärm is a four-panel cardstock screen. The front cover shows a fantasy scenery with a nordic sea giant emerging from the ocean.

The back displays the tables for the following topics:

I det vilda
Karaktärsdrag
Kroppspoäng
Träfftabeller
Förflyttning
Egenskaper på grund av storlek
Trudvangska namn
Vapen, skador och rustningar
Modifikationer
Övrigt

82993.name: NFL American Football Card Game
82993.description:
From the back of the box

American Football is one if Britain's fastest growing televised sports. Now you can bring all the razzmatazz and excitement of the NFL into your own front room - without the bruises.

Players aim to get rid of all their cards - but watch out, just as you are about to play the winning card there may be an interception.'

Starting with a first down card players take it in turns to try and play cards in sequence (1st down, 20 yard, 10 yard, Touchdown or 1st down, 40 yard, 50 yard punt). They may either play a sequential card featuring the team of the card before it or play another 1st down card featuring a different team. If a player cannot go they must exchange one card with the draw pile. Interception cards can be used as wild cards. The first person to play all their cards wins.

These jumbo cards feature the official illustrations representing five of the most famous teams from the football league in the 1980's: The Chicago Bears, The Washington Redskins, The Miami Dolphins, The Dallas Cowboys and The Pittsburgh Steelers.

82994.name: Matchmaker: Love U 2008
82994.description:
Matchmaker lets you take control of a cupid in training on a college campus. Create matches and set your friends up on dates in your goal to become the ultimate cupid. Manage their daily activities, set their schedules and pick their date. Even customize them with new clothing, accessories and style!

Source: The Developer Website.

82995.name: Battle Rapper
82995.description:
Battle Rapper sees you become War Child, a rap dude outcast at the top of the stakes. Take on a new identity and fight your way with words back to the top of the rap scene. Make sure you keep your rhythm and don't give up the dream.

Features


4 unique rhythm game plays created for the mobile platform
Narrative rhythm game - the user engages the overall story arc through a combination of rap battles and non interactive cut scenes
Full cast of memorable characters - each with their own styles, both on the street and on the stage


Source: The Publisher Website.

82996.name: Exile: Journey Through Darkness
82996.description:
With Exile, discover a world full of mystery, secrets and potential enemies. With a fascinating and twisted story full of reversals worthy of the best thrillers, get into horror and suspense ... Is your mind strong enough?

Source: The Developer Website.

82997.name: Arcticfox
videogameversion: Spanish Amstrad CPC Floppy Disk edition
82997.description:
From the back of the box

THE ARCTICFOX: Deadly tank of the near future. You command its bone-crunching power on a rescue mission to the Arctic wastelands. The odds? Lousy.

THE REALITY CHECK: You get it all. A three-dimensional battlefield. Accurate simulation of tank movement. Gut-wrenching stereo sound effects. Arcticfox feels so real you'll want to park it in the garage.

Your two on-screen hands work the controls and weaponry -- including cannon, guided missiles, mines, forward and aft viewscreens, and radar.

(screenshot)
The enemy. Faceless, soul-less killers. They outgun you 1000 to 1. But you have the Arcticfox.

(screenshot)
Erupt from ambush like the wrath of God. Match your strategic genius against theirs.

(screenshot)
The Heart Of The Beast. Enemy headquarters. Until you shut it down, you haven't done the job.

82998.name: Sky Blox
82998.description:
Your objective is to move the block throughout the level and try to slot it vertically into the yellow tile. The game boasts 80 levels split into four packs catering for all types - from laid back gamer to dare devil player!

It starts simple enough with the rookie level, but as you progress through the 3 other levels that can be downloaded directly from the game, new elements are introduced and the difficulty increases.

Features

Addictive gameplay: easy to play, hard to master!
Endless hours of fun!
High Quality Graphics
Four difficulty levels for all types of players
Two types of controls: touch or accelerometer
iPod music library access: listen to your own music while playing the game
Fully optimized for the touch screen with both landscape and portrait display




Source: The Publisher Website.

82999.name: Squeeze-Me!
82999.description:
Join the pimple pickin’ party with Squeeze Me! Use your camera to take your picture or a friend's, or simply choose from the given templates. Get ready to explode, treat or clean all different kinds of spots that will appear on the screen. Pop as many zits as possible to achieve the best score! Have even more fun by emailing your spotty snaps to your friends!

Features

Choose your "patient" : take pictures of you or a friend’s face or choose from one of the Squeeze Me templates
Start the game and you'll see spots appearing on the screen
Use the touch function to explode, treat or clean all the spots
Pick as many zits as possible to achieve the best score
Different types of spots requiring different treatment
Send spotty pics to your friend or upload to your favorite networking site
Listen to the revolting sounds and the gross vibrations




Source: The Publisher Website.

83000.name: Disney's Tarzan
videogameversion: North American Game Boy Color edition
North American PlayStation (Disney's Greatest Hits) edition
83000.description:
From the back of the box (PS, US):

Welcome to the Jungle

Overcome the jungle's most dangerous perils in this action-packed adventure. Relive Tarzan's journey through life from a headstrong youth to a courageous adult. Interact with unique characters, ride on elephants, solve challenging puzzles, and surf on trees. Master the moves of this ultimate jungle hero.

* Relive the feature film experience
* Animated scenes straight from the feature film
* 13 challenging levels
* Various bonus levels
